mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT INFOIDX, TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, INFODATE, ID, IP, PASSWORD, ISDEL, READCOUNT, GOOD, BAD, ROWNUM R FROM ( SELECT INFOIDX, TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, INFODATE, ID, IP, PASSWORD, ISDEL, READCOUNT, GOOD, BAD FROM INFO ORDER BY INFOIDX DESC ) ) WHERE R between #{START} and #{END}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFO
ID LIKE '%'||#{KEYWORD}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INFO VALUES( INFOIDX_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'INF', #{TITLE}, #{CONTENT}, SYSDATE, #{ID}, #{IP}, ${PASSWORD}, 'N', 0, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE INFO SET TITLE = #{TITLE}, CONTENT = #{CONTENT}, WHERE INFOIDX = #{INFOIDX}
UPDATE INFO SET ISDEL = 'Y' WHERE INFOIDX = #{INFOIDX}
UPDATE INFO SET READCOUNT = READCOUNT + 1 WHERE INFOIDX = #{INFOIDX}
UPDATE INFO SET GOOD = GOOD + 1 WHERE INFOIDX = #{INFOIDX}
UPDATE INFO SET BAD = BAD + 1 WHERE INFOIDX = #{INFOIDX}
